definitions.definition: To have; to have ownership of.
definitions.example: He does not even possess a working telephone.

definitions.definition: To take control of someone's body or mind, especially in a supernatural manner.
definitions.example: They thought he was possessed by evil spirits.

definitions.definition: (chiefly with of) To vest ownership in (someone, or oneself); to give someone power or knowledge; to acquaint; to inform.

definitions.example: He was exorcised because he was thought to be possessed by the Devil.
The president was possessed of great wealth.
